original_text: God let people kill Jesus on the cross because of the wrong things that we have done. Then God raised Jesus from death, to show that he would accept us as right with him. God let people kill Jesus on the cross because of the wrong things that we have done. Then God raised Jesus from death, to show that he would accept us as right with him.
korean_text: 예수는 우리가 범죄한 것 때문에 내줌이 되고 또한 우리를 의롭다 하시기 위하여 살아나셨느니라

sentences.original_text: God let people kill Jesus on the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 사람들이 예수님을 십자가에 죽게 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Then God raised Jesus from death
to show that he would accept us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 우리를 받아들이실 것을 보여주기 위해
